2V:460 Variant Reading …aggaḷaṭṭhapanāya ālokasandhiparikammāya dvatticchadanassa pariyāyaṃ appaharite⁕ ṭhitena adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ. Tato ce … apaharite (syā2.)
2V:460 Variant Reading …vihāraṃ kārayamānena yāva dvārakosā aggaḷaṭṭhapanāya⁕ ālokasandhiparikammāya dvatticchadanassa pariyāyaṃ appaharite … aggalaṭṭhapanāya (sī. syā1. syā3.)
2V:460 Variant Reading …ṭhitena adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ. Tato ce uttari⁕ appaharitepi ṭhito adhiṭṭhaheyya pācittiyan… uttariṃ (sī. syā1-3.)
2V:464 Variant Reading Yāva dvārakosāti piṭṭhasaṅghāṭassa⁕ samantā hatthapāsā. pīṭhasaṃghāṭassa (itipi), piṭṭhisaṅghāṭassa (syā1-3.)
2V:46 Variant Reading …rathakārosi, pukkusosīti bhaṇati⁕, āpatti vācāya, vācāya pācittiyassa… vadetīti uddeso. bhaṇatīti vitthāro (vajirabuddhi)
2V:476 Variant Reading Jānāti nāma⁕ sāmaṃ vā jānāti. Aññe … jānaṃ nāma (syā1-3.)
2V:478 Variant Reading …aññaṃ āṇāpeti, āpatti pācittiyassa⁕. Sakiṃ āṇatto bahukampi siñcati… āpatti dukkaṭassa (katthaci)
2V:481 Variant Reading Sappāṇakasikkhāpadaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ dasamaṃ. Bhūtagāmavaggo⁕ dutiyo. senāsanavaggo (sī.)

2V:496 Variant Reading …bhikkhuniyo ovadituṃ; na kho panetaṃ⁕ bhagavantaṃ uddissa pabbajitāya kāsāyavatthavasanāya … pana taṃ (?)

2V:501 Variant Reading …bhaginiyo, ovādoti niyyādetabbo⁕. Sace na vattantāyyāti… niyyātetabbo (itipi)

30Vbh:10 Variant Reading …rūpaṃ sukhumaṃ? Itthindriyaṃ kabaḷīkāro⁕ āhāro idaṃ vuccati rūpaṃ … kabaḷiṅkāro (sī. syā1-3. pā1.)
30Vbh:1174 Variant Reading …Yo cittassa āghāto caṇḍikkaṃ asuropo⁕ anattamanatā cittassa idaṃ vuccati … asusuropo (sī.), asulopo (syā2.), assuropo (syā3.)
30Vbh:1180 Variant Reading …kaṅkhāyitattaṃ vimati vicikicchā dveḷhakaṃ dvidhāpatho⁕ saṃsayo anekaṃsaggāho āsappanā parisappanā apariyogāhaṇā… dvedhāpatho (sī. syā1-3. pā1.)
30Vbh:1180 Variant Reading …saṃsayo anekaṃsaggāho āsappanā parisappanā apariyogāhaṇā⁕ chambhitattaṃ cittassa manovilekho ayaṃ … apariyogāhanā (sī. syā1-3. pā1. ka.-ma.)
30Vbh:1212 Variant Reading …bhāveti vivicceva kāmehi paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ⁕ upasampajja viharati pathavīkasiṇaṃ, tasmiṃ… paṭhamajjhānaṃ (sī.)
30Vbh:1212 Variant Reading …paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati pathavīkasiṇaṃ⁕, tasmiṃ samaye kusalamūlapaccayā saṅkhāro, … paṭhavīkasiṇaṃ (sī. syā1-3. pā1.)
30Vbh:1334 Variant Reading Paṭiccasamuppādavibhaṅgo⁕ niṭṭhito. paccayākāravibhaṅgo (syā1-3. pā1.)
30Vbh:1336 Cross Reference …pūraṃ nānappakārassa asucino paccavekkhati ⁕atthi imasmiṃ kāye kesā lomā… 7D:959; 9M:317; 18Kh:17; 27Ne:411
30Vbh:1336 Variant Reading …maṃsaṃ nhāru aṭṭhi aṭṭhimiñjaṃ⁕ vakkaṃ, hadayaṃ yakanaṃ kilomakaṃ … aṭṭhimiñjā (sī. pā1.)
30Vbh:1336 Variant Reading …nakhā dantā taco, maṃsaṃ nhāru⁕ aṭṭhi aṭṭhimiñjaṃ vakkaṃ, hadayaṃ… nahāru (sī. pā1.), nahārū (syā1.), nhārū (syā2. syā3.)
30Vbh:1337 Variant Reading …asucino paccavekkhati atthissa kāye⁕ kesā lomā nakhā dantā … atthi imasmiṃ kāye (sī.)
30Vbh:1339 Variant Reading …samupeto upāgato samupāgato upapanno sampanno⁕ samannāgato. Tena vuccati anupassī… samuppanno (sī. pā1.), samupapanno (syā1-3.), sī. cha. īdisameva
30Vbh:1339 Variant Reading …upeto hoti samupeto upāgato samupāgato⁕ upapanno sampanno samannāgato. Tena… apagato samupagato (sī.), sī. cha. īdisameva
30Vbh:1341 Variant Reading …Ātāpīti. Tattha katamo ātāpo⁕? Yo cetasiko vīriyārambho sammāvāyāmo… ātappaṃ (sī. syā1-3. pā1.), ātāpaṃ (sī.)
30Vbh:1346 Variant Reading …Idha bhikkhu sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayamāno⁕ sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayāmīti … vediyamāno (sī. pā1.), sī. cha. īdisameva
30Vbh:1346 Variant Reading …vedayamāno adukkhamasukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayāmīti⁕ pajānāti, sāmisaṃ vā sukhaṃ … vediyāmīti (sī. pā1.), sī. cha. īdisameva
30Vbh:1356 Variant Reading …byāpādaṃ santaṃ vā ajjhattaṃ thinamiddhaṃ⁕ santaṃ vā ajjhattaṃ uddhaccakukkuccaṃ… thīnamiddhaṃ (sī. syā1-3. pā1.)
30Vbh:1357 Variant Reading …santaṃ vā ajjhattaṃ vīriyasambojjhaṅgaṃ⁕ santaṃ vā ajjhattaṃ pītisambojjhaṅgaṃ… viriyasambojjhaṅgaṃ (sī. syā1-3. pā1.)
30Vbh:1384 Beginning Notes …Siyā sammattaniyatā, siyā aniyatā. ⁕Na maggārammaṇā, siyā maggahetukā…
30Vbh:1384 Ending Notes …siyā aniyatā. Na maggārammaṇā⁕, siyā maggahetukā, siyā maggādhipatino… maggārammaṇā (syā1-3. pā1.)
30Vbh:1385 Variant Reading …vattabbā hetū ceva sahetukā cāti⁕, sahetukā ceva na ca … sahetukāti (sī.)
30Vbh:1392 Variant Reading …chandaṃ janeti sañjaneti uṭṭhapeti samuṭṭhapeti⁕ nibbatteti abhinibbatteti. Tena vuccati… uṭṭhāpeti samuṭṭhāpeti (syā1-3. pā1.) evamuparipi
30Vbh:1392 Variant Reading …katamo chando? Yo chando chandikatā⁕ kattukamyatā kusalo dhammacchando ayaṃ… chandīkatā (syā1-3. pā1.)
30Vbh:1461 Variant Reading …Tadekajjhaṃ abhisaññūhitvā abhisaṅkhipitvā chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārotveva saṅkhyaṃ⁕ gacchati. saṅkhaṃ (sī.)
30Vbh:1461 Variant Reading …karitvā labhati samādhiṃ, labhati cittassekaggataṃ⁕ ayaṃ vuccati chandasamādhi…. cittassa ekaggataṃ (sī. syā1-3. pā1.)
30Vbh:1568 Variant Reading …Atthi kāyapassaddhi, atthi cittapassaddhi⁕. Yadapi kāyapassaddhi tadapi passaddhisambojjhaṅgo … cittappassaddhi (syā1-3. pā1. ka.-ma.)
30Vbh:1568 Variant Reading …katamo passaddhisambojjhaṅgo? Atthi kāyapassaddhi⁕, atthi cittapassaddhi. Yadapi … kāyappassaddhi (syā1-3. pā1. ka.-ma.)
30Vbh:1569 Variant Reading …katamo samādhisambojjhaṅgo? Atthi savitakko savicāro⁕ samādhi, atthi avitakko avicāro… savitakkasavicāro (sī.), sī. cha. īdisameva
30Vbh:1569 Variant Reading …samādhi, atthi avitakko avicāro⁕ samādhi. Yadapi savitakko savicāro … avitakkaavicāro (sī.), sī. cha. īdisameva
30Vbh:1579 Variant Reading …pamodanā hāso pahāso vitti odagyaṃ⁕ attamanatā cittassa pītisambojjhaṅgo ayaṃ … odaggaṃ (sī.) 29Dhs:388
30Vbh:1699 Cross Reference Idha bhikkhu ⁕pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto viharati, ācāragocarasampanno, aṇumattesu … 6D:274; 9M:153; 14S5:955; 15A2:79; 28Mi:1711
30Vbh:1700 Variant Reading …ālokite vilokite sampajānakārī hoti, samiñjite⁕ pasārite sampajānakārī hoti, saṅghāṭipattacīvaradhāraṇe … sammiñjite (sī. syā1-3. pā1.)
30Vbh:1701 Variant Reading …palālapuñjaṃ appasaddaṃ appanigghosaṃ vijanavātaṃ manussarāhasseyyakaṃ⁕ paṭisallānasāruppaṃ. So araññagato vā … manussarāhaseyyakaṃ (sī. syā1-3. pā1.)
30Vbh:1706 Cross Reference ⁕Bhikkhūti samaññāya bhikkhu, … 1V:86
30Vbh:1710 Variant Reading …dantakaṭṭhadānena vā cāṭukamyatāya vā muggasūpyatāya⁕ vā pāribhaṭyatāya vā jaṅghapesanikena vā… muggasuppatāya (sī.), muggasūpatāya (syā1-3. pā1.)
30Vbh:1711 Variant Reading …muggasūpyatāya na pāribhaṭyatāya na jaṅghapesanikena⁕ na aññataraññatarena buddhapaṭikuṭṭhena micchāājīvena jīvikaṃ… jaṅghapesaniyena (sī.), sī. cha. īdisameva
30Vbh:1713 Cross Reference ⁕Tattha katamo agocaro? Idhekacco … 16A5:615; 24Mn:1898
30Vbh:1723 Variant Reading …dhammehi cittaṃ parisodheti, rattiyā majjhimayāmaṃ⁕ dakkhiṇena passena sīhaseyyaṃ kappeti pāde… majjhimaṃ yāmaṃ (sī. syā1-3. pā1.)
30Vbh:1723 Variant Reading …passena sīhaseyyaṃ kappeti pāde pādaṃ⁕ accādhāya sato sampajāno uṭṭhānasaññaṃ … pādena pādaṃ (syā1-3. pā1.)
30Vbh:1731 Variant Reading …senāsanaṃ, bhisipi senāsanaṃ, bibbohanampi⁕ senāsanaṃ, vihāropi senāsanaṃ, aḍḍhayogopi… bimbohanampi (sī. pā1.), bimbohanaṃpi (syā1-3.)
30Vbh:1735 Variant Reading …adhivacanaṃ. Vanapatthanti bhīsanakānametaṃ⁕ senāsanānaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Vanapatthanti… bhiṃsanakānametaṃ (sī. syā1-3. pā1.)

31Dht:303 Variant Reading …22]( )⁕ (sabbe bandhā tathāyatana,
dhātuyo saccato tayo;
indriyānipi sabbāni,
te vīsati paṭiccato.
parato soḷasa padā,
tecattāḷīsakaṃ tike;
gocchake sattati dve,
ca satta cūḷantare padā.
mahantare padā vuttā,
aṭṭhārasa tato param;
aṭṭhāraseva ñatabbā,
sesā idha na hāsitāti.) (sī.)

35Y10:3072 Beginning Notes ⁕Suddhāvāsānaṃ upapatticittassa uppādakkhaṇe asaññasattaṃ upapajjantānaṃ…
35Y10:3072 Ending Notes …Suddhāvāsānaṃ upapatticittassa uppādakkhaṇe asaññasattaṃ upapajjantānaṃ⁕ tesaṃ tattha jīvitindriyaṃ uppajjati, … suddhāvāsaṃ upapajjantānaṃ asaññasattaṃ upapajjantānaṃ (syā1.), suddāvāsaṃ uppajjantānaṃ asaññasattaṃ uppajjantānaṃ (pā1.)
35Y10:3210 Variant Reading …tesaṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ cakkhundriyaṃ uppajjati⁕, no ca tesaṃ sotindriyaṃ … pacchimabhavikānaṃ sacakkhukānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ cakkhundriyaṃ uppajjati (pā1.)
35Y10:3216 Variant Reading …ca tesaṃ cakkhundriyaṃ uppajjati. Sacakkhukānaṃ⁕ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ ghānindriyañca uppajjissati cakkhundriyañca… itaresaṃ sacakkhukānaṃ (syā1. pā1.)
35Y10:3218 Variant Reading Pacchimabhavikānaṃ pañcavokāraṃ⁕ upapajjantānaṃ ye ca rūpāvacaraṃ arūpāvacaraṃ… sacakkhukānaṃ (syā1. pā1.)
35Y10:3239 Variant Reading Pacchimabhavikānaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ⁕ upapajjantānaṃ ye ca rūpāvacaraṃ arūpāvacaraṃ… saghānakānaṃ (syā1. pā1.)
35Y10:3263 Variant Reading …itthīnaṃ upapajjantīnaṃ yā ca itthiyo⁕ rūpāvacaraṃ arūpāvacaraṃ upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti yā… idaṃ padaṃ syā1. pā1. potthakesu natthi
35Y10:3307 Variant Reading Pacchimacittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ⁕ jīvitindriyaṃ uppajjati, no ca … pacchimacittassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā pacchimacittaṃ uppajjissati tassa cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ (syā1. pā1.)
35Y10:3332 Variant Reading …tattha sotindriyaṃ uppajjissati. Itaresaṃ sacakkhukānaṃ⁕ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cakkhundriyañca uppajjati… sacakkhukānaṃ pañcavokāraṃ (syā1. pā1.)
35Y10:3352 Variant Reading …tattha somanassindriyaṃ uppajjissati. Itaresaṃ sacakkhukānaṃ⁕ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cakkhundriyañca uppajjati… sacakkhukānaṃ pañcavokāraṃ (sī. syā1. pā1.)
35Y10:3364 Variant Reading Pacchimabhavikānaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ⁕ upapajjantānaṃ ye ca purisā eteneva… saghānakānaṃ (sī. syā1. pā1.)
35Y10:3372 Variant Reading Pacchimabhavikānaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ⁕ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha ghānindriyaṃ uppajjati… saghānakānaṃ (sī. syā1-3. pā1.)
35Y10:3424 Variant Reading Pacchimacittassa⁕ uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā upekkhāsampayuttapacchimacittaṃ… catuvokāre pañcavokāre pacchimacittassa (syā1. pā1.)
35Y10:3428 Variant Reading Pacchimacittassa⁕ uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā somanassasampayuttapacchimacittaṃ… catuvokāre pañcavokāre pacchimacittassa (syā1. pā1.)
35Y10:3456 Variant Reading …tesaṃ sotindriyaṃ na uppajjissati. Pañcavokāre⁕ parinibbantānaṃ arūpe pacchimabhavikānaṃ ye … idaṃ padaṃ syā1. pā1. potthakesu natthi
35Y10:3458 Variant Reading Pacchimabhavikānaṃ pañcavokāraṃ⁕ upapajjantānaṃ ye ca arūpaṃ upapajjitvā… sacakkhukānaṃ (syā1. pā1.)
35Y10:3458 Variant Reading …ca arūpaṃ upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti tesaṃ⁕ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ sotindriyaṃ na uppajjissati… tesaṃ sacakkhukānaṃ (syā1. pā1.)
35Y10:346 Variant Reading Na indriyā na cakkhu⁕? na cakkhundriyaṃ (syā1-3. pā1.) evamuparipi
35Y10:3488 Variant Reading …tesaṃ itthindriyaṃ na uppajjissati. Kāmāvacare⁕ parinibbantānaṃ rūpāvacare arūpāvacare pacchimabhavikānaṃ ye… idaṃ padaṃ syā1. pā1. potthakesu natthi
35Y10:3561 Beginning Notes …tesaṃ upekkhindriyaṃ na uppajjissati. ⁕Somanassasampayuttapacchimacittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe upekkhāsampayuttapacchimacittasamaṅgīnaṃ yassa cittassa …
35Y10:3561 Beginning Notes ⁕Sabbesaṃ cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe somanassavippayuttacittassa uppādakkhaṇe…
35Y10:3561 Ending Notes Sabbesaṃ cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe⁕ somanassavippayuttacittassa uppādakkhaṇe nirodhasamāpannānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ… vinā somanassena uppajjantānaṃ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe (syā1. pā1.)
35Y10:3561 Ending Notes …na uppajjati upekkhindriyañca na uppajjissati⁕. pacchimacittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe upekkhāsampayuttapacchimacittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ somanassindriyañca (syā1. pā1.)
35Y10:3563 Beginning Notes …na uppajjati. Somanassasampayuttapacchimacittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe ⁕upekkhāsampayuttapacchimacittasamaṅgīnaṃ yassa cittassa anantarā somanassasampayuttapacchimacittaṃ …
35Y10:3563 Ending Notes …anantarā somanassasampayuttapacchimacittaṃ uppajjissati tassa cittassa⁕ bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ upekkhindriyañca na uppajjissati… upekkhāsampayuttapacchimacittassa uppādakkhaṇe (syā1. pā1.)
35Y10:3563 Variant Reading …tesaṃ somanassindriyaṃ na uppajjati. Somanassasampayuttapacchimacittassa⁕ bhaṅgakkhaṇe upekkhāsampayuttapacchimacittasamaṅgīnaṃ yassa cittassa … pacchimacittassa (syā1. pā1.)
35Y10:3597 Variant Reading …tassa tattha jīvitindriyaṃ na uppajjissatīti⁕? uppajjatīti (syā1. pā1.)
35Y10:3598 Variant Reading Sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ acakkhukānaṃ⁕ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cakkhundriyaṃ … acakkhukānaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ (sī. syā1. pā1.)
35Y10:3598 Variant Reading Sabbesaṃ⁕ cavantānaṃ acakkhukānaṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ … pañcavokārā (syā1. pā1.)
35Y10:3658 Variant Reading Kāmāvacarā cavantānaṃ na purisānaṃ⁕ kāmāvacaraṃ upapajjantānaṃ rūpāvacarānaṃ arūpāvacarānaṃ … cavatānaṃ purisānaṃ (syā1. pā1.)
35Y10:3837 Variant Reading Kāmāvacare pacchimabhavikānaṃ ye ca saghānakā⁕ upekkhāya upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti tesaṃ tattha… idaṃ padaṃ syā1. pā1. potthakesu natthi
35Y10:3884 Variant Reading …asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha jīvitindriyaṃ uppajjittha⁕, no ca tesaṃ tattha … pañcavokāre pacchimacittasamaṅgīnaṃ asaññasattānaṃ ye ca upekkhāya upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti tesaṃ tattha jīvitindriyaṃ uppajjittha (syā1. pā1.)
35Y10:4012 Variant Reading …tattha somanassindriyaṃ na uppajjissatīti? Uppajjissati⁕. natthi (syā1. pā1.)
35Y10:4025 Variant Reading Suddhāvāsaṃ⁕ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha upekkhindriyaṃ na… suddhāvāsānaṃ (sī.)
35Y10:4052 Variant Reading Dve puggalā aññindriyaṃ bhāventi⁕, no ca domanassindriyaṃ pajahanti…. sakadāgāmimaggasamaṅgī aññindriyaṃ bhāveti (syā1. pā1.)
35Y10:4068 Variant Reading Aggamaggasamaṅgī⁕ anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāveti, no … aggamaggasamaṅgino (pā1.)
35Y10:4070 Beginning Notes ⁕Dve puggalā cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānanti, …
35Y10:4070 Ending Notes …na parijānanti aññindriyañca na bhāventi⁕. etthantare pāṭho sī. syā2. potthakesu natthi
35Y10:4088 Variant Reading Tayo maggasamaṅgino⁕ anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāventi, no … tayo puggalā (pā1.)
35Y10:4108 Beginning Notes ⁕Yo aggaphalaṃ sacchikaroti so cakkhundriyaṃ …
35Y10:4108 Ending Notes …so cakkhundriyañca parijānittha aññātāvindriyañca sacchikarittha⁕. āmantā (syā1. pā1.)
35Y10:4108 Variant Reading …aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikarittha. Yo aggaphalaṃ sacchākāsi⁕ so cakkhundriyañca parijānittha aññātāvindriyañca sacchikarittha… sacchikaroti (sī. syā2.)
35Y10:4123 Variant Reading Satta⁕ puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvittha, no … cha (sī. syā1. pā1.)
35Y10:4160 Variant Reading …cakkhundriyaṃ parijānissati so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvessatīti⁕? bhāvissatīti (sī. syā1. pā1.)
35Y10:4163 Variant Reading …so aññindriyaṃ bhāvessatīti? Āmantā⁕. dve puggalā cakkhundriyaṃ parijānissanti no ca aññindriyaṃ bhāvessanti, pañca puggalā cakkhundriyañca parijānissanti aññindriyañca bhāvessanti (ka.-cha.)
35Y10:4171 Variant Reading …pajahissati so aññindriyaṃ bhāvessatīti? Āmantā⁕. sakadāgāmimaggasamaṅgī domanassindriyaṃ pajahissati no ca aññindriyaṃ bhāvessati, cattāro puggalā domanassindriyañca pajahissanti aññindriyañca bhāvessanti (ka.-cha.)
35Y10:4173 Variant Reading Dve puggalā⁕ aññindriyaṃ bhāvessanti no ca domanassindriyaṃ… anāgāmī (ka.-cha.)
35Y10:4173 Variant Reading …bhāvessanti no ca domanassindriyaṃ pajahissanti⁕, pañca puggalā aññindriyañca bhavissanti… pajahissati (ka.-cha.)
35Y10:4173 Variant Reading …ca domanassindriyaṃ pajahissanti, pañca⁕ puggalā aññindriyañca bhavissanti domanassindriyañca pajahissanti… cattāro (ka.-cha.)
35Y10:4179 Variant Reading Cha⁕ puggalā aññindriyaṃ bhāvessanti, no … cattāro (ka.-cha.)
35Y10:4185 Variant Reading Aggamaggasamaṅgī aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikarissati⁕, no ca aññindriyaṃ bhāvessati… sacchikarissanti (ka.-cha.)
35Y10:4185 Variant Reading Aggamaggasamaṅgī⁕ aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikarissati, no ca… tayo puggalā (ka.-cha.)
35Y10:4185 Variant Reading …no ca aññindriyaṃ bhāvessati⁕. Satta puggalā aññātāvindriyañca sacchikarissanti… bhāvessanti (ka.-cha.)
35Y10:4193 Variant Reading …so cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānissatīti? Āmantā⁕. dve puggalā aññindriyaṃ na bhāvessanti no ca cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānissanti, tayo puggalā aññindriyañca na bhāvessanti cakkhundriyañca na parijānissanti (ka.-cha.)
35Y10:4201 Variant Reading Dve puggalā⁕ domanassindriyaṃ nappajahissanti, no ca … anāgāmī (ka.-cha.)
35Y10:4201 Variant Reading …aññindriyaṃ na bhāvessanti. Tayo⁕ puggalā domanassindriyañca nappajahissanti aññindriyañca na… cattāro (ka.-cha.)
35Y10:4201 Variant Reading …no ca aññindriyaṃ na bhāvessanti⁕. Tayo puggalā domanassindriyañca nappajahissanti… bhāvessati (ka.-cha.)
35Y10:4202 Variant Reading …bhāvessati so domanassindriyaṃ nappajahissatīti? Āmantā⁕. sakadāgāmimaggasamaṅgī aññindriyaṃ na bhāvessati no ca domanassindriyaṃ nappajahissati, cattāro puggalā aññindriyañca na bhāvessanti domanassindriyañca nappajahissanti (ka.-cha.)
35Y10:4207 Variant Reading Cha⁕ puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvessanti, … cattāro (ka.-cha.)
35Y10:4207 Variant Reading …ca aññindriyaṃ na bhāvessanti. Tayo⁕ puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāvessanti … pañca (ka.-cha.)
35Y10:4213 Variant Reading Aggamaggasamaṅgī aññindriyaṃ na bhāvessati⁕, no ca aññātāvindriyaṃ na … bhāvessanti (ka.-cha.)

35Y10:4242 Variant Reading Cha⁕ puggalā cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānanti, … pañca (syā1. pā1.)
35Y10:4264 Variant Reading Arahā⁕ anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāveti, no … dve puggalā (syā1-3. pā1.)

35Y10:4270 Variant Reading …ca anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāveti. Aṭṭha⁕ puggalā aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarittha anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca… satta (sī. syā1-3. ka.-ma.)
35Y10:4272 Variant Reading …ca aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarittha. Cha⁕ puggalā aññindriyañca na bhāventi aññātāvindriyañca… pañca (sī. syā2. syā3. ka.-ma.), aṭṭha (syā1. pā1.)

35Y10:4286 Variant Reading …pajahati so aññindriyaṃ bhāvessatīti? Āmantā⁕. no (ka.-cha.)

35Y10:4327 Variant Reading Cha⁕ puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāventi, … cattāro (ka.-cha.)

35Y10:4394 Variant Reading Dve⁕ puggalā aññindriyaṃ na bhāvessanti, … cattāro (ka.-cha.)
35Y10:43 Variant Reading Aññaṃ⁕ aññindriyaṃ? aññā (syā1. pā1.)
35Y10:569 Variant Reading Kāyindriyaṃ ṭhapetvā avaseso kāyo⁕, na kāyindriyaṃ. Kāyindriyaṃ kāyo… avaseso kāyo kāyo (sī. syā1. pā1.), avasesā kāyo (syā2. syā3. ka.-ma.)
35Y10:618 Variant Reading Kāyindriyaṃ ṭhapetvā avaseso⁕ na kāyindriyaṃ, kāyo. Kāyañca… avaseso kāyo (sī. syā1. pā1.), avasesā (syā2. syā3.)
35Y10:661 Variant Reading …Sotindriyaṃ indriyañceva sotindriyañca. Avasesā indriyā⁕ na sotindriyaṃ. indriyā indriyā (sī. syā1-3. pā1.)
35Y10:752 Variant Reading Cakkhundriyaṃ indriyañceva cakkhundriyañca⁕. Avasesā indriyā na cakkhundriyaṃ… aññātāvindriyañca (sī.)
35Y10:752 Variant Reading …Avasesā indriyā na cakkhundriyaṃ⁕. na aññātāvindriyaṃ (sī.)
35Y10:951 Beginning Notes ⁕Yaṃ sotaṃ indriyaṃ taṃ sotañceva …
35Y10:951 Ending Notes …indriyañca. Avasesaṃ sotaṃ na indriyaṃ⁕. āmantā (sī. syā1. pā1.)

35Y10:961 Ending Notes …indriyañca. Avaseso kāyo na indriyā⁕. āmantā (sī. syā1. pā1.)
35Y10 Variant Reading Paṇṇattivāraniddesa⁕ paññattiniddesavāro (sī.)

3V:72 Variant Reading …kho pana, bhikkhave, dukkhasamudayaṃ⁕ ariyasaccaṃ yāyaṃ taṇhā ponobbhavikā… ettha “idaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccanti ādīsu dukkhasamudayo dukkhanirodhoti vattabbe dukkhasamudayaṃ dukkhanirodhanti liṅgavipallāso kato” ti paṭisambhidāmaggaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. visuddhimaggaṭīkāyaṃ pana uppādo bhayantipāṭhavaṇṇanāyaṃ “satipi dvinnaṃ padānaṃ samānādhikaraṇabhāve liṅgabhedo gahito, yathā dukkhasamudayo ariyasaccan” ti vuttaṃ. tesu “dukkhasamudayo ariyasaccan” ti sakaliṅgikapāṭho “dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasaccan” ti pāḷiyā sameti

4V:367 Variant Reading …āsi aññāṇanissitā; Diṭṭhiyāppaṭinissagge⁕, ukkhepaṃ jinabhāsitaṃ. diṭṭhiappaṭinissagge (syā1-3. pā1. ka.-ma.)
4V:368 Variant Reading Niyassakammaṃ pabbajjaṃ⁕, tatheva paṭisāraṇī; Adassanāppaṭikamme… pabbājaṃ (sī. pā1. ka.-ma.)

4V:4 Variant Reading Atha kho bhagavā te⁕ bhikkhū anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā dubbharatāya dupposatāya… paṇḍukalohitake (syā1-3.)

4V:4 Variant Reading …sallekhassa dhutassa pāsādikassa apacayassa vīriyārambhassa⁕ vaṇṇaṃ bhāsitvā bhikkhūnaṃ tadanucchavikaṃ tadanulomikaṃ… viriyārambhassa (sī. syā1-3. pā1.), vīriyārabbhassa (ka.-ma.)

4V:521 Variant Reading …Dutiyampi yācitabbaṃ. Tatiyampi yācitabbaṃ⁕. Byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṃgho… yācitabbo (sī.) evamuparipi

4V:610 Variant Reading …adāsi. So parivutthaparivāso saṃghaṃ⁕ antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā… so saṃghaṃ (ka.-ma.)
4V:61 Variant Reading …ananulomikehi gihisaṃsaggehi; apissu bhikkhū pakatā⁕ parivāsaṃ dentā mūlāya paṭikassantā mānattaṃ… pakatattā (syā1-3.)
4V:621 Variant Reading …ekāhappaṭicchannā, dve āpattiyo dvīhappaṭicchannāyo⁕, tisso āpattiyo tīhappaṭicchannāyo, catasso… dvīhapaṭicchannāyo (sī. syā1-3.), dvīhapaṭicchannā (pā1.), dvīhappaṭicchannā (ka.-ma. evaṃ yāvadasāhappaṭicchannā)
4V:62 Variant Reading …codetvā sāretabbo, sāretvā āpattiṃ āropetabbo⁕, āpattiṃ āropetvā byattena bhikkhunā… āpatti āropetabbā (sī. syā1-3.), āpattiṃ ropetabbo (pā1.)
4V:62 Variant Reading …saṃgho seyyasakassa bhikkhuno niyassakammaṃ⁕ karotu nissāya te vatthabbanti…. nissayakammaṃ (pā1.), niyasakammaṃ (ka.-ma.)
4V:642 Variant Reading …āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ itarampi māsaṃ parivāsaṃ⁕ yāceyyanti. itarampi māsaparivāsaṃ (sī. syā1-3. ka.-ma.) evamuparipi
4V:646 Variant Reading …āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ itarampi māsaṃ parivāsassa⁕ dānaṃ, so tuṇhassa; yassa… itarampi māsaparivāsassa (sī. ka.-ma.), itarassapi māsaparivāsassa (syā1-3.)
4V:648 Variant Reading …āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ itarampi māsaṃ parivāso⁕. Khamati saṃghassa, tasmā tuṇhī… itarampi māsaparivāso (sī. ka.-ma.), itaropi māsaparivāso (syā1-3.)
4V:679 Variant Reading …parivasanto, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhipiyyati⁕. Ukkhittakassa, bhikkhave, parivāso … ukkhipīyati (sī. ka.-ma.), ukkhipiyati (syā1-3. pā1.)
4V:679 Variant Reading …ruhati. So ce puna osāriyyati⁕, tassa tadeva purimaṃ parivāsadānaṃ…. osārīyati (sī. ka.-ma.), osāriyati (syā1-3. pā1.)
4V:691 Variant Reading …sambahulā saṃghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjati parimāṇā⁕ appaṭicchannāyo. So bhikkhu mūlāya … parimāṇāyo (sī. syā1-3.)
4V:694 Variant Reading …sambahulā saṃghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjati aparimāṇā⁕ appaṭicchannāyo aparimāṇā paṭicchannāyo aparimāṇā… aparimāṇāyo (sī. syā1-3.)
4V:697 Variant Reading …āpajjitvā appaṭicchādetvā vibbhamati. So puna⁕ upasampanno tā āpattiyo nacchādeti. … so ce puna (sī. ka.-ma.)
4V:738 Variant Reading …tā āpattiyo nacchādeti. So vibbhamitvā⁕ puna upasampanno yā āpattiyo pubbe… so bhikkhu vibbhamitvā (ka.-ma.)
4V:745 Variant Reading …so dukkaṭaṃ desāpetabbo. Yathāpaṭicchanne cassa⁕ parivāsaṃ datvā ubhinnampi mānattaṃ … yathāpaṭicchannañcassa (sī.), yathāpaṭicchannānañcassa (sī.)
4V:763 Variant Reading Mūlāyaavisuddhinavakaṃ⁕ niṭṭhitaṃ. mūlāyapaṭikassana avisuddhinavakaṃ (sī.), mūlavisuddhanavakaṃ (pā1.), samūlāvisuddhinavakaṃ (ka.-ma.)
4V:764 Beginning Notes ⁕Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu…
4V:769 Ending Notes …tāhi āpattīhi. (9)⁕

Idaṃ navakaṃ porāṇapotthakesu avisuddhivaseneva āgataṃ, vuccamānatatiyanavakena ca saṃsaṭṭhaṃ. Taṃ paṭivisodhakehi asaṃsaṭṭhaṃ katvā visuṃ patiṭṭhāpitaṃ. sī. syā1-3. potthakesu pana taṃ visuddhivaseneva āgataṃ. Taṃ panevaṃ veditabbaṃ—

Mūlāyavisuddhinavaka

Idha pana bhikkhave bhikkhu sambahulā saṃghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjati parimāṇampi aparimāṇampi…pe… vavatthitampi sambhinnampi. So saṃghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ samodhānaparivāsaṃ yācati, tassa saṃgho tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ samodhānaparivāsaṃ deti, so parivasanto antarā sambahulā saṃghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjati parimāṇāyo appaṭicchannāyo…pe… parimāṇāyo paṭicchannāyo…pe… parimāṇāyo paṭicchannāyopi appaṭicchannāyopi. So saṃghaṃ antarāāpattīnaṃ mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yācati, taṃ saṃgho antarāāpattīnaṃ mūlāya paṭikassati dhammikena kammena akuppena ṭhānārahena, dhammena samodhānaparivāsaṃ deti, dhammena mānattaṃ deti, dhammena abbheti. So bhikkhave bhikkhu visuddho tāhi āpattīhi. (1--3)

Idha pana bhikkhave bhikkhu sambahulā saṃghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjati parimāṇampi aparimāṇampi…pe… vavatthitampi sambhinnampi. So saṃghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ samodhānaparivāsaṃ yācati, tassa saṃgho tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ samodhānaparivāsaṃ deti, so parivasanto antarā sambahulā saṃghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjati aparimāṇāyo appaṭicchannāyo…pe… aparimāṇāyo paṭicchannāyo…pe… aparimāṇāyo paṭicchannāyopi appaṭicchannāyopi. So saṃghaṃ antarāāpattīnaṃ mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yācati, taṃ saṃgho antarāāpattīnaṃ mūlāya paṭikassati dhammikena kammena akuppena ṭhānārahena, dhammena samodhānaparivāsaṃ deti, dhammena mānattaṃ deti, dhammena abbheti. So bhikkhave bhikkhu visuddho tāhi āpattīti. (4--6)

Idha pana bhikkhave bhikkhu sambahulā saṃghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjatī parimāṇampi aparimāṇampi…pe… vavatthitampi sambhinnampi. So saṃghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ samodhānaparivāsaṃ yācati, tassa saṃgho tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ samodhānaparivāsaṃ deti, so parivasanto antarā sambahulā saṃghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjati parimāṇāyopi aparimāṇāyopi appaṭicchannāyo…pe… parimāṇāyopi aparimāṇāyopi paṭicchannāyo…pe… parimāṇāyopi aparimāṇāyopi paṭicchannāyopi appaṭicchannāyopi. So saṃghaṃ antarāāpattīnaṃ mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yācati, taṃ saṃgho antarāāpattīnaṃ mūlāya paṭikassati dhammikena kammena akuppena ṭhānārahena, dhammena samodhānaparivāsaṃ deti, dhammena mānattaṃ deti, dhammena abbheti. So bhikkhave bhikkhu visuddho tāhi āpattīhi. (7--9)

Mūlāyapaṭikassanavisuddhinavakaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
4V:769 Ending Notes …tāhi āpattīhi. (9)⁕

Idaṃ navakaṃ porāṇapotthakesu avisuddhivaseneva āgataṃ, vuccamānatatiyanavakena ca saṃsaṭṭhaṃ. Taṃ paṭivisodhakehi asaṃsaṭṭhaṃ katvā visuṃ patiṭṭhāpitaṃ. sī. syā1-3. potthakesu pana taṃ visuddhivaseneva āgataṃ. Taṃ panevaṃ veditabbaṃ—

Mūlāyavisuddhinavaka

⁕ Idha pana bhikkhave bhikkhu sambahulā saṃghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjati parimāṇampi aparimāṇampi…pe… vavatthitampi sambhinnampi. So saṃghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ samodhānaparivāsaṃ yācati, tassa saṃgho tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ samodhānaparivāsaṃ deti, so parivasanto antarā sambahulā saṃghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjati parimāṇāyo appaṭicchannāyo…pe… parimāṇāyo paṭicchannāyo…pe… parimāṇāyo paṭicchannāyopi appaṭicchannāyopi. So saṃghaṃ antarāāpattīnaṃ mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yācati, taṃ saṃgho antarāāpattīnaṃ mūlāya paṭikassati dhammikena kammena akuppena ṭhānārahena, dhammena samodhānaparivāsaṃ deti, dhammena mānattaṃ deti, dhammena abbheti. So bhikkhave bhikkhu visuddho tāhi āpattīhi. (1--3)

Idha pana bhikkhave bhikkhu sambahulā saṃghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjati parimāṇampi aparimāṇampi…pe… vavatthitampi sambhinnampi. So saṃghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ samodhānaparivāsaṃ yācati, tassa saṃgho tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ samodhānaparivāsaṃ deti, so parivasanto antarā sambahulā saṃghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjati aparimāṇāyo appaṭicchannāyo…pe… aparimāṇāyo paṭicchannāyo…pe… aparimāṇāyo paṭicchannāyopi appaṭicchannāyopi. So saṃghaṃ antarāāpattīnaṃ mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yācati, taṃ saṃgho antarāāpattīnaṃ mūlāya paṭikassati dhammikena kammena akuppena ṭhānārahena, dhammena samodhānaparivāsaṃ deti, dhammena mānattaṃ deti, dhammena abbheti. So bhikkhave bhikkhu visuddho tāhi āpattīti. (4--6)

Idha pana bhikkhave bhikkhu sambahulā saṃghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjatī parimāṇampi aparimāṇampi…pe… vavatthitampi sambhinnampi. So saṃghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ samodhānaparivāsaṃ yācati, tassa saṃgho tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ samodhānaparivāsaṃ deti, so parivasanto antarā sambahulā saṃghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjati parimāṇāyopi aparimāṇāyopi appaṭicchannāyo…pe… parimāṇāyopi aparimāṇāyopi paṭicchannāyo…pe… parimāṇāyopi aparimāṇāyopi paṭicchannāyopi appaṭicchannāyopi. So saṃghaṃ antarāāpattīnaṃ mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yācati, taṃ saṃgho antarāāpattīnaṃ mūlāya paṭikassati dhammikena kammena akuppena ṭhānārahena, dhammena samodhānaparivāsaṃ deti, dhammena mānattaṃ deti, dhammena abbheti. So bhikkhave bhikkhu visuddho tāhi āpattīhi. (7--9)

Mūlāyapaṭikassanavisuddhinavakaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
4V:771 Variant Reading …bhikkhave, bhikkhu visuddho tāhi āpattīhi⁕. (1) ayaṃ paṭhamavāro sī. syā1-3. potthakesu paripuṇṇo dissati
4V:772 Variant Reading …So tasmiṃ bhūmiyaṃ ṭhito purimāāpattīnaṃ⁕ antarāāpattiyo sarati, aparāāpattīnaṃ antarāāpattiyo… purimānaṃ āpattīnaṃ (ka.-ma.), purimāpattīnaṃ (ka.-cha.) nānāpāṭhā passitabbā
4V:774 Variant Reading …bhikkhave, bhikkhu visuddho tāhi āpattīhi⁕. (4--7) imepi cattāro vārā sī. syā1-3. potthakesu paripuṇṇā dissanti
4V:782 Variant Reading …Ummattakadesanañca, Mūlā aṭṭhārasa visuddhato⁕. mūlāyapaṭivisuddhako (sī.), mūlaṭṭhārasa visuddhito (syā1-3.), mūlā pannarasa visuddhato (pā1.), mūlā pannarasa visuddhato (ka.-ma.)
4V:783 Variant Reading Ācariyānaṃ vibhajjapadānaṃ⁕, Tambapaṇṇidīpapasādakānaṃ; Mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ, … vibhajjavādīnaṃ (sī.)
4V:789 Variant Reading …imaṃ gaṇhāhi, imaṃ rocehīti⁕. Evañcetaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasammati, adhammena… imaṃ gaṇhatha, imaṃ rocethāti (ka.-ma.)
4V:807 Cross Reference ⁕Tena samayena buddho bhagavā rājagahe… 1V:1556 ādīsu
4V:807 Variant Reading …hoti. Natthi cassa kiñci uttari⁕ karaṇīyaṃ, katassa vā paticayo…. uttariṃ (sī. pā1.)
4V:808 Variant Reading …paññapehi bhattāni ca uddisāhīti⁕. Evaṃ, bhanteti … uddisāti (1V:1556)
4V:808 Variant Reading …sammannitabbo. Paṭhamaṃ dabbo mallaputto yācitabbo⁕. Yācitvā byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena … dabbo yācitabbo (sī. syā1-3. pā1. ka.-ma.)
4V:812 Variant Reading …Ye te bhikkhū tiracchānakathikā kāyadaḷhibahulā⁕ viharanti tesampi ekajjhaṃ senāsanaṃ paññapeti… kāyadaḍḍhibahulā (sī.), kāyadaḷhībahulā (pā1.)
4V:813 Variant Reading …paññapehi. Amhākaṃ, āvuso, gotamakakandarāyaṃ⁕ senāsanaṃ paññapehi. Amhākaṃ, āvuso… gotamakandarāyaṃ (sī.), gomaṭakandarāyaṃ (syā1-3. kaṃ. pā1.)

5V:1074 Variant Reading …Aṭṭha paccayavārā niṭṭhitā. ( )⁕ imassānantaraṃ sī. potthake evampi dissati—
tesaṃ uddānaṃ—
kativāro ca vipattivāro ca saṅgahavāro,
samuṭṭhānavāro ceva adhikaraṇavāro ca;
samathavāro ca samuccayavāro ca ime satta vārā,
ādito paññattivārena saha aṭṭha vārā honti.

kativāro ca vipattivāro ca saṅgahavāro,

samathavāro ca samuccayavāro ca ime satta vārā,
ādito paññattivārena saha aṭṭha vārā honti.

7D:579 Beginning Notes …khomasukhumānaṃ kappāsikasukhumānaṃ koseyyasukhumānaṃ kambalasukhumānaṃ; ⁕rañño, ānanda, mahāsudassanassa caturāsīti…

7D:579 Ending Notes …rañño, ānanda, mahāsudassanassa⁕ caturāsīti thālipākasahassāni ahesuṃ sāyaṃ pātaṃ… idaṃ pāṭho pā1. potthake natthi
7D:579 Variant Reading …pariṇāyakaratanappamukhāni; caturāsīti dhenusahassāni ahesuṃ duhasandanāni⁕ kaṃsūpadhāraṇāni; caturāsīti vatthakoṭisahassāni ahesuṃ … duvasandanāni (sī.), dukūlasandanāni (pā1.), dukūlasandānāni (13S3:606), dukūlasandhanāni (17A9:166)
7D:586 Variant Reading …ānanda, subhaddā devī assūni puñchitvā⁕ rājānaṃ mahāsudassanaṃ etadavoca pamajjitvā (sī. syā1-3. kaṃ. pā1.), puñjitvā (ka.-ma.)
7D:588 Variant Reading …gihibhūto dhamme pāsāde brahmacariyaṃ cari⁕. So cattāro brahmavihāre bhāvetvā… brahmacariyaṃ ācari (syā1-3. kaṃ.), brahmacariyamacari (ka.-ma.)
7D:588 Variant Reading …rajjaṃ kāresi. Caturāsīti vassasahassāni gihibhūto⁕ dhamme pāsāde brahmacariyaṃ cari…. gihībhūto (sī. pā1.), gīhibhūto (kaṃ.)
7D:588 Variant Reading …ānanda, mahāsudassano caturāsīti vassasahassāni kumārakīḷaṃ⁕ kīḷi. Caturāsīti vassasahassāni oparajjaṃ… kīḷitaṃ (sī. ka.-ma.), kīḷikaṃ (pā1.)
7D:590 Variant Reading …samayena paccupaṭṭhāti khattiyānī vā vessinī⁕ vā. Tesaṃ kho panānanda, … velāmikānī (sī. pā1.), vessāyinī (syā1-3. kaṃ.), velāmikā (13S3:606), saṃyuttaṭṭhakathā oloketabbā

7D:596 Variant Reading …amutra upapanno, asu amutra upapanno⁕. Paropaññāsa nātikiyā paricārakā abbhatītā … uppanno (pā1.), upapannoti (ka.-ma.)
7D:596 Variant Reading …kāsikosalesu vajjimallesu cetivaṃsesu kurupañcālesu majjhasūrasenesu⁕ asu amutra upapanno, … macchasūrasenesu (sī. pā1.), macchasurasenesu (syā1-3. kaṃ.)
7D:596 Variant Reading …parikkhayā rāgadosamohānaṃ tanuttā sakadāgāmino, sakideva⁕ imaṃ lokaṃ āgantvā dukkhassantaṃ karissanti… sakiṃdeva (ka.-ma.)
7D:596 Variant Reading …sutaṃ ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā nātike⁕ viharati giñjakāvasathe. Tena kho … nādike (sī. syā1-3. kaṃ. pā1.)

7D:599 Variant Reading …kālaṅkate upapattīsu na byākareyya, dīnamanā⁕ tenassu māgadhakā paricārakā; yena… ninnamanā (syā1-3. kaṃ.), dīnamānā (pā1.)
7D:599 Variant Reading …kālaṅkatā. Suññā maññe aṅgamagadhā aṅgamāgadhakehi⁕ paricārakehi abbhatītehi kālaṅkatehi. Te … māgadhikehi (syā1-3. kaṃ.), māgadhakehi (pā1.)

7D:827 Variant Reading …ṭhito kho pañcasikho gandhabbadevaputto beluvapaṇḍuvīṇaṃ⁕ assāvesi, imā ca gāthā … veḷuvapaṇḍuvīṇaṃ ādāya (syā1-3. kaṃ.)
7D:838 Variant Reading …sato; Amataṃ muni jigīsāno⁕, tamahaṃ sūriyavacchase. jigiṃsāno (sī. syā1-3. kaṃ. pā1.)
7D:842 Variant Reading …tantissarena; na ca pana⁕ te, pañcasikha, tantissaro gītassaraṃ… neva pana (syā1-3. kaṃ.)

7D:84 Variant Reading …pathaviṃ sāgarapariyantaṃ adaṇḍena asatthena dhammena⁕ abhivijiya ajjhāvasati. Sace kho … dhammena samena (syā1-3. kaṃ.)
7D:850 Variant Reading …ca devānaṃ tāvatiṃsānaṃ kehici kehici⁕ kiccakaraṇīyehi byāvaṭo; evāhaṃ nāsakkhiṃ … kehici (syā1-3. kaṃ.)

7D:851 Variant Reading …Sā itthittaṃ virājetvā purisattaṃ⁕ bhāvetvā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā… purisacittaṃ (syā1-3. kaṃ. pā1.)
7D:851 Variant Reading …mārisā, tassa bhagavato dhammaṃ assuttha⁕ ahañhi nāma itthikā samānā … assutthā (sī.), āyūhittha (syā1-3. kaṃ.), assutvā (pā1.)

8D:191 Variant Reading …muddhābhisitto rājisissa paṭissutvā ariye cakkavattivatte⁕ vatti. Tassa ariye cakkavattivatte … ariyaṃ cakkavattivattaṃ (ka.-ma.)
8D:193 Variant Reading …kho, mahārāja, svāgataṃ te⁕ mahārāja, sakaṃ te, … svāgataṃ (syā1-3.), sāgataṃ (pā1.)
8D:193 Variant Reading …paṭirājāno, te rañño cakkavattissa anuyantā⁕ ahesuṃ. anuyuttā (sī. pā1.)
8D:194 Variant Reading …bhikkhave, cakkaratanaṃ puratthimaṃ samuddaṃ ajjhogāhetvā⁕ paccuttaritvā dakkhiṇaṃ disaṃ pavatti … ajjhogāhitvā (sī.), ajjhogahetvā (syā1-3. pā1.)
8D:194 Variant Reading …pana, bhikkhave, padese cakkaratanaṃ⁕ patiṭṭhāsi, tattha rājā cakkavattī … dibbaṃ cakkaratanaṃ (sī. ka.-cha.)
8D:195 Variant Reading …pana, bhikkhave, padese cakkaratanaṃ⁕ patiṭṭhāsi, tattha rājā cakkavattī … dibbaṃ cakkaratanaṃ (sī. ka.-cha.)
8D:196 Variant Reading …paccāgantvā rañño cakkavattissa antepuradvāre atthakaraṇapamukhe⁕ akkhāhataṃ maññe aṭṭhāsi rañño cakkavattissa… aḍḍakaraṇapamukhe (ka.-ma.)
8D:19 Variant Reading …ti vatvā tattheva uttāno papati⁕. paripati (sī. syā1-3. ka.-ma.)
8D:201 Variant Reading …dovārikā mantassājīvino mayañceva aññe ca⁕ ye mayaṃ ariyaṃ cakkavattivattaṃ dhārema… aññe ca paṇḍite samaṇabrāhmaṇe puccheyyāsi (ka.-ma.)
8D:202 Variant Reading …kammante ca payojehi, samaṇabrāhmaṇesu⁕ uddhaggikaṃ dakkhiṇaṃ patiṭṭhāpehi sovaggikaṃ sukhavipākaṃ… samaṇesu brāhmaṇesu (syā1-3. pā1.)
8D:202 Variant Reading …paresaṃ adinnaṃ theyyasaṅkhātaṃ ādiyīti⁕? Saccaṃ, devāti…. ādiyasīti (syā1-3.)
8D:204 Variant Reading …imaṃ purisaṃ daḷhāya rajjuyā pacchābāhaṃ⁕ gāḷhabandhanaṃ bandhitvā khuramuṇḍaṃ karitvā … pacchābāhuṃ (syā1-3.)
8D:204 Variant Reading …imaṃ purisaṃ sunisedhaṃ nisedheyyaṃ, mūlaghaccaṃ⁕ kareyyaṃ, sīsamassa chindeyyanti…. mūlachejjaṃ (sī. ka.-ma.), mūlaghacchaṃ (syā1-3.)
8D:205 Variant Reading …nagaraghātampi upakkamiṃsu kātuṃ, panthaduhanampi⁕ upakkamiṃsu kātuṃ. Yesaṃ te … panthadūhanampi (sī. syā1-3. pā1.)
8D:205 Variant Reading …yannūna mayampi tiṇhāni satthāni kārāpessāma⁕, tiṇhāni satthāni kārāpetvā yesaṃ… kārāpeyyāma (syā1-3. pā1.), kārāpeyyāmāti (sī.)
8D:219 Variant Reading …Dasavassāyukesu, bhikkhave, manussesu pañcavassikā⁕ kumārikā alaṃpateyyā bhavissanti. Dasavassāyukesu, … pañcamāsikā (sī.)
8D:219 Variant Reading …bhikkhave, manussesu kudrūsako aggaṃ bhojanānaṃ⁕ bhavissati. Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, … aggabhojanaṃ (syā1-3.)
8D:21 Variant Reading …uttarena vesāliṃ bahuputtaṃ nāma⁕ cetiyaṃ taṃ nātikkameyyanti. … bahuputtakannāma (syā1-3.)
8D:21 Variant Reading …yasaggappatto ca vajjigāme. Tassa sattavatapadāni⁕ samattāni samādinnāni honti yāvajīvaṃ… satta vattapadāni (syā1-3. pā1.)
8D:220 Variant Reading …sabbaṃ antaradhāyissanti, dasa akusalakammapathā atibyādippissanti⁕. Dasavassāyukesu, bhikkhave, manussesu… ativiya dippissanti (syā1-3. pā1.)
8D:221 Variant Reading …gamissati yathā ajeḷakā kukkuṭasūkarā soṇasiṅgālā⁕. soṇasigālā (sī. pā1.), soṇā sigālā (syā1-3.)
8D:223 Variant Reading …migoti aññamaññaṃ jīvitā voropessanti⁕. voropissanti (syā1-3.)

8D:224 Ending Notes …vā nadīviduggaṃ vā pabbatavisamaṃ vā⁕ pavisitvā sattāhaṃ vanamūlaphalāhārā yāpessanti. … te tiṇagahanaṃ vanagahanaṃ rukkhagahanaṃ nadīviduggaṃ pabbatavisamaṃ (pā1.)
8D:224 Variant Reading …mā ca mayaṃ kañci⁕, mā ca amhe koci, … kiñci (ka.-ma.)

8D:229 Variant Reading …parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ pakāsemi. So anekasahassaṃ⁕ bhikkhusaṃghaṃ pariharissati, seyyathāpāhametarahi … anekasatasahassaṃ (sī. ka.-ma.)

8D:337 Variant Reading …upasaṅkamitvā etamatthaṃ bhagavato ārocessāmāti⁕. Evaṃ, bhanteti … āroceyyāmāti (syā1-3.)

8D:342 Variant Reading …yañca pasaṃsati, yo ca pasaṃsito⁕ bhiyyoso mattāya vīriyaṃ ārabhati. … pasattho (syā1-3. pā1.)
8D:354 Variant Reading Udako⁕ sudaṃ, cunda, rāmaputto evaṃ… uddako (sī. syā1-3. pā1.)
8D:354 Variant Reading …Idamettha upakaḍḍheyya, evaṃ taṃ paripūraṃ⁕ assāti, iti hetaṃ … parisuddhataraṃ (sī. syā1-3. ka.-ma.), paripūrataraṃ (?)
8D:354 Variant Reading …anatthasaṃhitaṃ khurameva sandhāya. Yañca taṃ⁕, cunda, sammā vadamāno vadeyya… yañcetaṃ (sī. syā1-3. ka.-ma.)
8D:354 Variant Reading …assāti, iti hetaṃ na passati⁕. Idamettha upakaḍḍheyya, evaṃ taṃ… na passatīti (syā1-3. ka.-ma.)

8D:387 Beginning Notes …byākatā, yathā te byākātabbā. ⁕Yathā ca te na byākātabbā, …
8D:387 Ending Notes …vo ahaṃ te tathā byākarissāmi⁕? Santi kho, cunda, … etthantare pāṭho sī. potthake natthi, yathā ca te na byākātabbā (syā1-3. pā1.)

(syā1-3.), laddhamānusakaṃ bhavaṃ tato caviya, na sukataphalavipākasesakena; pāṭilabhati lapanajaṃ samam api, suvisuddhaṃ suvisukkaṃ. (pā1.)

panudipāpassa hi sucībhi parivuto,
bhavati malakhilakakilesepanudebhīti. (syā2. syā3.),
